title: Did Iron Man use antimatter as his fuel for his repulsors? - Quora

response.answer_text: anything can happen in comics. here physics is bent to our own will. jokes aside, the thing about anti-matter is its highly volatile. even a little spec of it causes massive damage. hell even harnessing it is a arduous task. say tony uses it for his repulsors. many times tony’s repulsors are damaged while fighting. this time the anti matter consumes all the matter around it and causes a blast equivalent to a hydrogen bomb. in short, tony is a walking explosive. let me give you an example of anti matter. remember the movie angels and demons. remember when the vial of anti matter is exploded in the air. imagine what happens if it happens on ground. you get your answer
